education.courses: CS, Computer Vision, Data Science, Analysis of Algorithms

experience.summary: Worked as summer intern at Samsung Research and Development Institute Banglore. Worked on developing a tool along with other group members.

projects.summary: Created an ER Diagram and corresponding Relational model for delivery system and database for the project. It includes the relationship between Customers, Orders, Restaurants, Delivery boy etc. Database is normalized to reduce the data redundancy. Stored data using Oracle SQL Developer for real-time application or queries.
Designed a website to help users to locate their problems and the solutions instantly. Users can make connections and check each other's answers.

summary: Thrive in a challenging working environment. Time management. Hard Working. Willing to learn and upskill.
